item.title: Firstpost
item.author: Rigved
item.description: For referencing syntax and testing Outputing image Rolls (figure) Printing gist Highlighting HTML <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> For Code grunt.initConfig({ assemble: { options: { assets: 'docs/assets', data: 'src/data/*.{json,yml}', helpers: 'src/custom-helpers.js', partials: ['src/partials/**/*.{hbs,md}'] }, pages: { options: { layout: 'default.hbs' }, files: { './': ['src/templates/pages/index.hbs'] } } } }; Commands for Deployment 199 200 hugo -t LoveIt hugp serve -D -disableFastRender
